::Ramulus/Slayer::

"Not yet," Ramulus replies as he watches Slayer circle around him, 
obvioustly sizing him up before pouncing, "But I might be soon!"

The last word was spoken quickly as Slayer jumps on him, tackling
both 
bots to the ground. Bringing his feet up, Ramulus tries to kick
Slayer 
off, but without much success.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> SnowCat::
> 
> She leaps down from her hiding place and runs for Ramulus.  Sees he 
> had activated his cloaking devise and uses her nose to sniff him 
> out.  "Ramulus, are you hurt?"  She started to get closer to 
Ramulus, 
> not knowing she was in Slayer's range, following her nose to find 
> Ramu
